articles.description: Chelsea boss Mauricio Pochettino says "two parties" must agree on his future at the end of the season.
articles.title: Mauricio Pochettino: Chelsea sacking would 'not be a problem'

articles.description: England coach Brendon McCullum holds talks with leading wicket-taker James Anderson about the veteran's future.
articles.title: James Anderson: England bowler's future in doubt after talks with Brendon McCullum

articles.description: Former US Open champion Dominic Thiem says he will retire later this year because of the wrist injury which derailed his career.
articles.title: Dominic Thiem to retire this year because of wrist injury

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says there is "no strain" in his relationship with Tiger Woods but admits they do not "see eye-to-eye" on the sport's future.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy denies fall-out with Tiger Woods over future of golf

articles.description: Departing West Ham manager David Moyes says it is the right decision for him and the club that he is leaving after the end of the season.
articles.title: David Moyes: Departing West Ham boss wants to stay in management

articles.description: German champions Bayer Leverkusen offer fans free club tattoos to commemorate their title-winning season and record unbeaten run.
articles.title: Bayer Leverkusen to offer fans free tattoos after Bundesliga title win

articles.description: Listen to BBC local radio commentaries and follow live text coverage from day one of the County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Day one - radio & text

articles.description: Louis van Gaal was sacked in 2016 after Manchester United won the FA Cup, but boss Erik ten Hag does not fear a repeat this season.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: Manchester United owners have 'common sense'

articles.description: It is hard to think of a more consistent leadership presence in British sport than Heather Knight, who begins her ninth summer as England captain with eyes on the T20 World Cup and the Ashes.
articles.title: Heather Knight: England captain on longevity, Pakistan, T20 World Cup and Ashes

articles.description: Carlo Ancelotti praises Vinicius Jr after the forward’s impressive season for Real Madrid.
articles.title: Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti praises Vinicius Jr
